remarks: Every vertex in a friendship graph (with more than 1 vertex) is part of a 3-cycle.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Nov-2017.)
statement:
3cyclfrgra $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ 1 < ( # ` V ) ) -> A. v e. V E. f E. p ( f ( V Cycles E ) p /\ ( # ` f ) = 3 /\ ( p ` 0 ) = v ) ) $.
$d E f p v $.
$d V f p v $.
